Text: Many times Marvel Calendar is wrong so don't trust it very much.
Fury Max is just a mini-series...#5 should be the last issue unless I'm mistaken (which happens really frequently).

I was waiting for Hulk #56 myself.
Yeah Demonoid is going to be missed if it doesn't make it back.
Is anyone using z-cult?

Great work FLSM79.. We have a DC weekly release for all new 52 titles, but not for marvel so far. btw, I feel the best source for finding the comics coming out each week is comiclist -http://www.comiclist.com/index.php

comicvine does not always contain all titles updated in its new comics section imo.
